Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The argonomorph situation in the {@Rgn:45003$$Vale of the Reaper} is out of control.

Kill {@LinkCreature:45#2001#argonomorph blood fiends}, {@LinkCreature:45#2002#horntoads}, and {@LinkCreature:45#2003#frogmasters}.

Report to Laetesha at Pathfinder Post when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
